title: 强行吐槽论坛手机版
author: Wang_Funny
txt_content:
1.论坛没有app，而别的都有
2.就算没有app那也要做好移动版
3.例如任务系统
3.例如消息系统
4.好友系统
5.论坛的手机图标还是Dz
6.我认为应该像bukkit，spigt mc 一样
精致 强行吐槽

replies.author: Wang_Funny
replies.txt_content: 技术快更新啊 手机用的很不爽的

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: dz所有手机版论坛默认都是这样的..

replies.txt_content:
minehenry 发表于 2016-10-21 21:23
dz所有手机版论坛默认都是这样的..

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 九幽之帝 于 2016-10-21 21:28 编辑 

1.手机APP正在研发当中
2.不要把MC论坛和其他相比 什么叫应该像精致 你是说论坛不精致咯
3.论坛任务是有的，你没看到而已 




"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.txt_content:
